definition: to raise (animals)/to bring up (children)/to keep (pets)/to support/to give birth

sentences.english: Literacy is both content and information technology.
sentences.chinese: 文化素养既指内容科技，也指信息科技。

sentences.english: We have to guarantee universal access to literacy.
sentences.chinese: 我们要保证世界上所有人都能够提升文化素养。

sentences.english: Objective To understand the status of health literary about recruits.
sentences.chinese: 目的掌握入伍新兵健康素养情况。

sentences.english: A literate girl or woman is also far more likely to be health literate.
sentences.chinese: 一个有文化的女童或者妇女也更可能具备卫生素养。

sentences.english: The training of teacher information literacy is the key to improving e-education.
sentences.chinese: 加强教师的信息素养是提升教育信息化水平的关键。

sentences.english: Levels of educational attainment are quite low among recentimmigrant groups.
sentences.chinese: 在近期移民群体，教育素养非常低。

sentences.english: Thanksgiving consciousness is an indispensable personality trait for university students.
sentences.chinese: 感恩意识是当代大学生必备的人格素养。

sentences.english: Provide information service to the local farmers & herdsmen. Improve their information literacy.
sentences.chinese: 为当地农牧民提供信息服务，提升他们的信息素养。

sentences.english: We make the assumption that we need it workforce.
sentences.chinese: 我们假定我们的生产力需要高文化素养。

sentences.english: Their reading ability is at level one or two.
sentences.chinese: 都存在文化素养问题，他们的读写能力很低。

sentences.english: A project for selecting and implementing assessment models in teaching Art and …
sentences.chinese: 艺术与人文素养指标绩优学校评选实施计画。

sentences.english: Contemporary college students must have the quality of network media literacy.
sentences.chinese: 网络媒介素养是当代大学生必须具备的媒介素质。

sentences.english: The main part of the thesis is divided into five chapters.
sentences.chinese: 第二章主要论述唐代国子监学官的学术素养。

sentences.english: What we need, well, let me tell, is no single literacy.
sentences.chinese: 不仅仅是简单的文化素养。

sentences.english: Civilized words are the presentation of a national quality.
sentences.chinese: 文明用语是一个民族素养的体现。

sentences.english: Love this job and keep improving to be both a planner and a translator.
sentences.chinese: 积极的敬业爱岗，提高专业素养，成为策划型翻译。
